name: Swedish Construction Federation
membership:
Confederation of Swedish Enterprise
FIEC (European construction industry federation)
goal:
The Swedish Construction Federation (BI) represents construction industry interests in Sweden.

The Swedish Construction Federation is the trade association for private construction companies and employers. Our more than 3,100 members include over twenty corporations larger than one hundred employees, and some 1,400 companies with under ten employees.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
Energy efficiency directive
Renewable energy directive
Energy performance of Buildings directive
Waste protocol
Waste directives
